isComplete() - Method in class org.newsclub.net.unix.ssl.SNIHostnameCapture
Checks if a hostname can be returned by calling SNIHostnameCapture.getHostname() (which most likely means the handshake is complete).
isComplete(long, TimeUnit) - Method in class org.newsclub.net.unix.ssl.SNIHostnameCapture
Checks if a hostname can be returned by calling SNIHostnameCapture.getHostname() (which most likely means the handshake is complete), optionally waiting up to the given time interval if not yet complete.
